formalpara.title: Internal help for this application in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'ParkedCall' =-
[Synopsis] Answer a parked call
[Description] ParkedCall(exten):Used to connect to a parked call. This application is always registered internally and does not need to be explicitly added into the dialplan, although you should include the 'parkedcalls' context.

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.2 to 1.4:
Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.4 to 1.6:

para.screen:
--- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -4,7 +4,8 @@ Answer a parked call
[Description] - ParkedCall(exten):Used to connect to a parked call. This application is always + ParkedCall(exten): Used to connect to a parked call. This application is always registered internally and does not need to be explicitly added into the dialplan, although you should include the 'parkedcalls' - context. + context. If no extension is provided, then the first available + parked call will be acquired.
